bloodFiend:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
bloodFiend:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

bloodFiend:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
bloodFiend:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
bloodFiend:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

bloodFiend:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
bloodFiend:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

bloodFiend:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
bloodFiend:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !bloodFiend:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

bloodFiend:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
bloodFiend:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !bloodFiend:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
